sspEndDate.label: When does your Statutory Sick Pay end?
sspEndDate.hint:
You can find this on form SSP1 if your employer has given it to you. If not, check with your employer or accountant.

For example, %s

errors.required: Enter the date your Statutory Sick Pay ends
errors.missingDay: Date your Statutory Sick Pay ends must include a day
errors.missingMonth: Date your Statutory Sick Pay ends must include a month
errors.missingYear: Date your Statutory Sick Pay ends must include a year
errors.missingDayAndMonth: Date your Statutory Sick Pay ends must include a day and a month
errors.missingDayAndYear: Date your Statutory Sick Pay ends must include a day and a year
errors.missingMonthAndYear: Date your Statutory Sick Pay ends must include a month and a year
errors.badFormatYear: Enter the date your Statutory Sick Pay ends with a year in the right format, for example 2001 not 01
errors.notReal: Enter a real date your Statutory Sick Pay ends
errors.notRealDigits: Enter a real date your Statutory Sick Pay ends, using only digits
errors.inPast: Date your Statutory Sick Pay ends must be today or in the future
